name: inline
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: inline-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: This mailing list is for users and developers of the Inline:: series of modules, which let you write Perl subroutines/methods in other programming languages like C, C++ and Python.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: inline-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: inline-help@perl.org
